abilities.name: Gnawing Aura
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, whenever your opponent attaches an Energy card from their hand to 1 of their Pokémon, put 3 damage counters on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hollow Missile
attacks.effect: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent’s Benched Pokémon in any way you like.
